sysevent_email_template.message_html:
Hi ${event.group.owner},

I am checking in to see when you would like to schedule and organize your next event for the  ${event.group.city} chapter. We encourage all Meetup chapters to schedule at least one event every quarter in order to keep their developer community engaged so let me know some dates that might work for you!

Please let me know if you have any questions.

Best,

Tanvi Gokhale

Platform Product Marketing Co-op

servicenow

sysevent_email_template.subject: Inquiring About Your Next ServiceNow Developer Meetup
